title: 2(1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Climate, Energy and the Environment
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Climate, Energy and the Environment 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 3 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited climate energy environment (delegation ministerial functions) order 2025 (2) order come operation 3 june 2025

title: 2(1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment conferred on him - 

(a) 

by or under the Acts of the Oireachtas specified in Part 1 of the 
Schedule, 

(b) by or under the provision of the Act of the Oireachtas specified in 

Part 2 of the Schedule, and 

(c) 

under the Regulations specified in Part 3 of the Schedule, 

are delegated to Alan Dillon, Minister of State at the Department of Climate, 
Energy and the Environment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [257] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister climate energy environment conferred - (a) act oireachtas specified part 1 schedule (b) provision act oireachtas specified part 2 schedule (c) regulation specified part 3 schedule delegated alan dillon minister state department climate energy environment notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 3rd june 2025 257 3

title: 2(1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of
heading: Waste Management Act 1996 (No. 10 of 1996)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

Waste Management Act 1996 (No. 10 of 1996) 

Litter Pollution Act 1997 (No. 12 of 1997) 

Circular Economy and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 26 of 2022) 

Section 14 of the Waste Management (Amendment) Act 2001 (No. 36 of 2001) 

Part2 

Part3 

Waste Management (Licensing) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 395 of 2004) 

European Communities (Waste Directive) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 126 of 
2011) 

European Union (Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment) Regulations 2014 
(S.I. No. 149 of 2014) 

European Union (End-of-Life Vehicles) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 281 of 2014) 

European Union (Packaging) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 282 of 2014) 

European Union (Batteries and Accumulators) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 283 
of 2014) 

European Union (Single Use Plastics) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 516 of 
2021) 

European Union (Extended Producer Responsibility) (Tobacco Filters 
Containing Plastic) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 609 of 2022) 

European Union (Extended Producer Responsibility) (Wet Wipes) Regulations 
2022 (S.I. No. 610 of 2022) 

European Union (Extended Producer Responsibility) (Balloons) Regulations 
2022 (S.I. No. 611 of 2022) 

European Union (Extended Producer Responsibility) (Fishing Gear Containing 
Plastic) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 612 of 2022) 

Separate Collection (Deposit Return Scheme) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 33 of 
2024) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

27 May, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

.
